channel.title: NPC Dialogue
channel.description:
Hey guys.
I tryd to add some NPC dialogue's when I added like 5 cases and tryd to talk to the npc the only things he said was the text in case 1 and 2 any ideas how to fix it and make it it says like 5 cases ?
Thanks, LittleMaffia.

item.title: NPC Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

No you guys this isn’t how you fix it, you need to add another npcdialog like this…

NpcDialogue == 900 || NpcDialogue == 901 || add on to yours like this… every case you make to talk you have to add another one of these.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

you need different frame numbers on the end or it will just give you the first one.

this bit is for 4 lines if that works better…

sendFrame200(4901, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126("", 4904); sendFrame126("", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900);

Read full topic

you could make a click to contiinue button

item.title: NPC Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @LittleMaffia LittleMaffia
item.description:
@LittleMaffia wrote:

Nop I did somthing like this :

		case 1:
			p.sendFrame200(4883, 591);
			p.sendFrame126(p.GetNpcName(p.NpcTalkTo), 4884);
			p.sendFrame126("what ever", 4885);
			p.sendFrame75(p.NpcTalkTo, 4883);
			p.sendFrame164(4882);
			p.NpcDialogueSend = true;
			break;

		case 2:
			p.sendFrame200(4883, 591);
			p.sendFrame126(p.GetNpcName(p.NpcTalkTo), 4884);
			p.sendFrame126("what ever 1", 4885);
			p.sendFrame75(p.NpcTalkTo, 4883);
			p.sendFrame164(4882);
			p.NpcDialogueSend = true;
			break;

		case 3:
			p.sendFrame200(4883, 591);
			p.sendFrame126(p.GetNpcName(p.NpcTalkTo), 4884);
			p.sendFrame126("blabla112efdsdf.", 4885);
			p.sendFrame75(p.NpcTalkTo, 4883);
			p.sendFrame164(4882);
			p.NpcDialogueSend = true;
			break;

		case 4:
			p.sendFrame200(4883, 591);
			p.sendFrame126(p.GetNpcName(p.NpcTalkTo), 4884);
			p.sendFrame126("blabla112efdsdf.", 4885);
			p.sendFrame75(p.NpcTalkTo, 4883);
			p.sendFrame164(4882);
			p.NpcDialogueSend = true;
			break;

		case 5:
			p.sendFrame200(4883, 591);
			p.sendFrame126(p.GetNpcName(p.NpcTalkTo), 4884);
			p.sendFrame126("blabla112efdsdf.", 4885);
			p.sendFrame75(p.NpcTalkTo, 4883);
			p.sendFrame164(4882);
			p.NpcDialogueSend = true;
			break;

I want to make it like that but I added it after I clicked on the npc it says only
the text from case 1 and 2

Read full topic
